name: Run Boom Chicken
description:
RUN BOOM CHICKEN

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A game where you run from geese, and soothe your gluttony. See how far you can survive :D
WASD to move, and shift to move fast

OTHER INFO

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The downloadable version is nicer (at least on windows)!

Let me know if the downloadables don't work on Linux or MacOS

Music is FuzzBuzz by Soundroll (Thanks!)
